website_summaries.verdict: A basic, heavy-duty ring that gets the job done.
pros: Use alone or combine with bricks and pavers
cons: May rust if it's left out in the rain or snow

customer_reviews.title: Very nice! Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Simple to put together, once bolted together is very sturdy. We haven't used it yet, still in process of building with brick around it but comparing to other rings we were looking at we are very happy with this one! Can't wait to use it! Chris C.
customer_reviews.author: Gosia

customer_reviews.title: Most durable steel fire ring
customer_reviews.text: This fire ring came quickly and when we recieved this fire ring it was of great quality , we had it put together in no time. We sure are enjoying the fires we're building in this colder weather....
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Terrell

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, some finish issues.
customer_reviews.text: Poor finish quality. Scratched, chipped and will end up getting rusty. Sturdy though, but I now need to resolve the damage caused, which doesn't look like a result of poor packing, more a result of lack of quality control. Update: seller has offered to resolve and I'm waiting for the that to happen and will give them the benefit of the doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Parsons #1

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and as described
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned when the box arrived. It was ripped and partially opened but everything inside was fine. It would be beneficial if they shipped it in a more substantial box. Once I started pulling things out of the box, it was clear everything was still in the box and that there wasn't any damage. As others have said in other reviews, there are no instructions, but it is easy to figure it out and put everything together. It has been raining here a lot, so we put it together in our living room. We haven't used it yet because the temperature has been high. That said, it is a very sturdy firepit and we are glad we purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Lamberth

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Fire Ring
customer_reviews.text: Great fire ring. Looks great as an addition to my 5 level pavers that I installed. The ring is keeping the pavers looking brand new and it will extend the life of my fire pit. Received a lot of positive comments on the fire pit as the ring makes it look much more professional.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great option for larger ring.
customer_reviews.text: It was simple to put together and looks like. The packaging it came in was kinda beat up and messy. Aside from that, it’s good. I also found it difficult to find a lot of options for rings over 36 inches. This is nice and simple for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to use while constructing our new fire pit. He used it as the inside and then based the width and height around it. It’s worked out really well and made building very easy. We have already used to grilling rack to make burgers and they turned out great. The handle to the the rack was very handy and my husband used the brush to easily clean it when we were done. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Great Ring!
customer_reviews.text: This ring was exactly what I was looking for. Once I fitted it inside the stone it looked good and did exactly what it is supposed to do. It protects the stone and keeps the heat going up. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Earle B. Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this item, the first one got lost, second one came couple weeks later. It is sturdy however after a few weeks outside we haven't lit yet because it's too warm and the ring is already rusting. Contacted seller and they were very eager to make it right. Issue resolved. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Thalassenos

customer_reviews.title: Great fire ring
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a ring for a fire pit that is larger than standard 36 inches. This was a perfect fit. Easy assembly and adjustment. The only negative is that the lip that sits on top of bricks is not consistently straight at 90 degree angle from the ring (a slight gap between the lip and bricks underneath). Other than, that it is a great ring at this price.
customer_reviews.author: ed007

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty pit
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, extremely sturdy and heavy, my pit arrived with box severely damaged because of the weight. metal was slightly bent on one edge. Hammered back into place because I did not want to bother returning. The rim gets very hot be careful with children.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This pit is huge! Can’t wait to get the patio pavers in and add the stone surround.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Husband is super excited to cook pizzas over the fire. It’s bigger than we thought and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Used this to line our masonry pit. It was a little dinged from shipping- lousy packaging, but it doesn’t really show. Overall, it is heavy and thick and should hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: KHamade

customer_reviews.title: Value at
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value! Super easy to assemble. My package accidentally was shipped without the screws, by my husband got some to put it together. Emailed the seller and they promptly responded and gave a small credit for the mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlie

customer_reviews.title: Easy Set Up
customer_reviews.text: This is a very easy ring to put together. The overall design is ideal for any pit. The one con to this is if the ring gets scratched or has any paint chip, it instantly starts to rust.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing welds means rust
customer_reviews.text: The welds were not complete on this. Untreated metal rusted after one night.
customer_reviews.author: Nuttle

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty quality ring.
customer_reviews.text: It is very good quality. My husband put it together in under 30 minutes. Have had a couple fires and still looks new.
customer_reviews.author: Gram

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I got the 45in firepit ring and it's a good size. Easy to put together and very durable. The only bad thing was, it started to rust in the rain, in small areas. TC
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: We are happy with the Fire Pit ring, the measurements are correct and the quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Theonette Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Doing the job
customer_reviews.text: Fire pit ring was sturdy and fit well inside the fire pit. It seems to be protecting the pavers nicely. -zp
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and good quality. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Harry West

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good design
customer_reviews.text: A product built to last for a long time. It is worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Tesh

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and fits nicely into my custom built fire pit. Looking forward to many fires.
customer_reviews.author: Mom22boys

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Large enough for a great fire. Guaranteed to keep the wife warm.
customer_reviews.author: donald chio

customer_reviews.title: This definitely isn't a circle so it's not the 25.6 potrayed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my fire pit required a 25-26" OD, without the lip. It is a good quality piece of metal, might not be worth the money BUT it does the trick. I had to cut off the 2 pieces of metal that were attached on the outside. I also had to push to bend it back into a semi-kinda circle. Bent, in a good position, it's 24 1/2" in one direction and 24 3/4" in the other. Would I buy it again? Sure but I wouldn't pay full price. This feels about $60 at your local hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly, works great. I had to install the screws backward, for my application, but I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Dohm

customer_reviews.title: HARDWARE NOT INCLUDED!
customer_reviews.text: This package was clearly opened and re-taped. There was no instruction, no nut and bolt hardware, just four metal sides of the ring to assemble using your own materials. Just opening it now that our landscaping is complete. Should’ve checked it immediately!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Works but doesn’t look the best
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived today with a lot of scratches. There were no instructions and once we got it together the pieces did not line up very well. We tried moving the pieces around for a better fit but it didn’t help. It is not going to look near as good as we had hoped with all the gaps between each section. I would return it but we couldn’t find one anyplace else.
customer_reviews.author: TP2491
